title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 303: Featuring Bill Armstrong + Brian Yandle & Mike Mottau (The Rink Shrinks)
description:
On Thursday’s episode of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Arizona Coyotes GM Bill Armstrong and The Rink Shrinks, Mike Mottau & Brian Yandle. Bill joined (51:32) to discuss his first days as the Yotes GM, the OEL situation, having Whit and Biz in St. Louis and a bunch more. The guys are then joined by the Rink Shrinks (01:29:32) for some emails and to discuss their new podcast. The boys also talk about the new Sandbagger on Youtube, Doc Emrick, Joe Thornton a tons more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
